shortcuts.validation_error: Invalid shortcut key format. Please enter in format like 'Cmd+;' or 'Ctrl+;'
shortcuts.available_keys_html:
Available Key Notations (Examples)
  • Modifier Keys: Ctrl, Alt, Shift, Meta (Cmd)
  • Special Keys: Enter, Space (Spacebar), Tab, Esc, Backspace, Delete, Home, End, PageUp, PageDown, ↑ ↓ ← →
  • Function Keys: F1~F12
  • Symbol Keys: ';', ',', '.', '/', '\\', '[', ']', '-', '=' etc. (write as-is)
Notation Rules
  • Connect with + when combining with modifier keys (e.g., Ctrl+Shift+S, Cmd+;)
  • Space should be written as Space or Spacebar
  • Write symbols as their literal characters (add brackets for clarification if needed)
